thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com | 4 of 157
thread.title: RICK MAGEE
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by RICK MAGEE

author: RICK MAGEE
title: RICK MAGEE
text: As a beginner beekeeper I found the onsite personnel very knowledgeable and patient answering all of my questions with detail. The 4 part webinar was exceptional and the website offers more educational sources. When I ran into a couple of issues where the information wasn't readily available a quick phone call resolved my questions.
